name: King & Queen
description:
Guide the King and Queen through a dungeon in this puzzle platformer!

King & Queen is a short game made in Godot for the Brackey's 2021.1 Game Jam with the theme "Stronger Together." In this game you must guide the captured King and Queen through a dungeon by switching between the two characters, while avoiding spikes and lasers. Lasers can be turned off by walking onto the switch. 

Controls: A/D = move, Space = jump, E = switch to Queen, Q = switch to King, ESC = pause game.
